title: CH4 heating curve - energy required to melt 64 g

content.description: The following questions refer to the graph below, which shows the heating curve for methane, CH4.
content.question:
How much energy is required to melt 64 g of methane at 90 K? (The molar mass of methane 
is 16 g/mol.)

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
